post.body: nope...that's just how twitter tracks who you're responding to. It puts a link in the message to the other person. :)
I think it's something about books you've always wanted to read, but haven't for whatever reason. Hello...Anna Karenina.
(re. TBR) That's what I suspect, but I have no idea either. Yes! So glad you're in. I'm so excited to start coming up with my list.
I am your buddy! Love that picture of you btw.
Twilight definitely does not.
not that I only care about how it looks. ;)
You're right, that is pretty. I hadn't seen the newer ones.
You should sell me on the Sony reader then. The kindle is just so pretty...
I wondered about that. They generally are good? I've had nightmares about hair disasters, but $18 is pretty alluring.
Returned from 1st holiday party of the year. Saw Grandma and sipped lots of wine. Acquainted myself with the cheese & the shrimp cocktail.
Meta-tweet? @mikecane and @jkottke. What is up dudes? I am proud that I caught that Magritte reference. ;)
I think that it should be mandatory for coats/blazers/jackets to have inside pockets.
FW staff In Memorium to VHS: http://tinyurl.com/9l55xo. My fave: The Parent Trap w/ Haley Mills.
My ultimate and impossible X-mas wishlist would include sweater of my previous tweet and a Kindle. :) cornflower blue + brown=stunning.
The fair isle sweaters knitted by Icelandic renaissance woman Rebekka from flickr are amazing.http://www.flickr.com/photos/rebba/2608396364/
Can one of you recommend an affordable hair stylist in NYC? My lustrous locks ;) are quickly becoming worthy of the descriptor, scraggly.
haha...Periodic Table of Awesoments: http://tinyurl.com/66urot
We could have a bi-coastal book group of sorts...w/o reading the same books...does that work?
She thinks @JKep and @KMac091 should do it with her. :)
And this: http://tinyurl.com/a8fszh
